original_text: Some Pharisees were watching Jesus carefully. They wanted to find a reason to say that Jesus was doing wrong things. It was the Jewish day of rest. So the Pharisees watched Jesus to see if he would make the man well on this day.
korean_text: 사람들이 예수를 고발하려 하여 안식일에 그 사람을 고치시는가 주시하고 있거늘

sentences.original_text: Some Pharisees were watching Jesus carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 바리새인들이 예수님을 주의 깊게 지켜보고 있었다

sentences.original_text: They wanted to find a reason
to say that Jesus was doing wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님이 잘못된 일을 하고 있다고 말하기 위한

sentences.original_text: It was the Jewish day of rest
to see if he would make the man well
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그 사람을 고쳐줄지 보기 위해
